_inspectorSnowReport.Alert:
Due to high winds, lift operations have been reduced for the day (January 9). Valley and South ski areas are open until 4:30 PM. 
 After 4:30 PM, Southern Comfort Express and both South and Village beginner areas will be open until 9PM. The Ridge Runner is closed today and scheduled to reopen along with lift operations tomorrow (January 10) Please see below for more details.
